title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The former First Lady’s inspiring memoir sharing her journey from childhood to the White House and beyond.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A timeless novel about following your dreams and listening to your heart, through the journey of a shepherd boy.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance and propaganda to control its citizens.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A classic novel that explores racial injustice and moral growth in the Deep South through a child’s perspective.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A tragic tale of wealth, love, and the American Dream in the Roaring Twenties.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: An influential book revealing how our minds work with two systems of thinking: fast, intuitive and slow, deliberate.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A guide to spiritual enlightenment and living fully in the present moment.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: Explores the history and impact of Homo sapiens from ancient times to the modern era.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A story of teenage rebellion and alienation narrated by Holden Caulfield.

title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A vision of a genetically engineered and socially controlled dystopian future.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Bilbo Baggins embarks on a quest filled with adventure, dragons, and treasure.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series introducing the magical world of Hogwarts.

title: The Road
author: Cormac McCarthy
description: A father and son journey through a bleak post-apocalyptic world.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
description: A gripping mystery featuring a journalist and a brilliant hacker.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A psychological thriller about a missing wife and the secrets behind her disappearance.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
author: John Green
description: A poignant story of two teenagers who fall in love while battling cancer.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A sprawling epic set on the desert planet Arrakis, focusing on politics and power.

title: The Martian
author: Andy Weir
description: An astronaut stranded on Mars uses science and wit to survive.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who escapes her survivalist family and pursues an education.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide on how tiny changes can lead to remarkable results.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by focusing on what truly matters.

title: Meditations
author: Marcus Aurelius
description: Stoic philosophy reflections from the Roman emperor on life, duty, and virtue.

title: The Art of War
author: Sun Tzu
description: Ancient Chinese military treatise on strategy, tactics, and warfare.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a violent act.

title: Normal People
author: Sally Rooney
description: Explores complex relationships and emotional intimacy between two young people.
